thread.title: Mr. Trump’s unpresidential ways
thread.title_full: Mr. Trump’s unpresidential ways - The Washington Post

author: washingtonpost.com
title: Mr. Trump’s unpresidential ways
text:
October 5 at 7:29 PM Regarding John Lemandri’s Oct. 2 letter, “ A presidential-looking Mr. Trump ”:
So Donald Trump looked presidential when presenting his tax plan. But how presidential is it to say that he will send Syrian refugees home to be slaughtered if he is president? How presidential is it to insult one’s opponents? How presidential is it to demean this country by calling its leaders stupid while praising foreign leaders? (If President Obama did this, he would have already been impeached by Republicans.)
Presidential, indeed!
Fay Baker , Elkridge
